comment.author: Cole
comment.text: Keep laughing with your emotional incontinence as if you have pseudo-bulbar affect like HRC and make sure your laughter doesn't end up in tears for whoever laughs last will laugh better.

replies.author: Dillon
replies.text: Juan take your stupidity elsewhere. This place is for People who love America and want corruption ended!! You can go with that too by the way!

replies.author: Cole
replies.text: Dillon You are a paid troll, aren't you ? Of course this a place for people who love America but not a la HRC style who never wears an American flag lapel pin. Obviously, you don't know anything about pseudo-bulbar affect and that makes you an ignorant. HRC to AFL-CIO: And why aren't I 50 points ahead ? Who is the stupid here? You !
